content.content: The 27th week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcements  WARNING:  Cred scores and payouts may see volatility in the coming weeks and months as we tweak the algorithm and payout parameters. We still have a lot of work to do before the system is optimized enough to “ossify”, producing predictable payouts. Payouts This week $5,000 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Cred Stats Total Cred created (a proxy for work) continues its weekly uptrend. Is “the doubling” (payouts increasing from $2,500 to $5,000 DAI a week) already priced in? Or will Cred break ATH of ~4000 Cred?   image788×575 76.1 KB  This week’s increase appears primarily driven by OGs with high Cred scores picking up the pace. Below is a chart of the top Cred earners in the last six weeks  Welcome to the top 10 @yaronvel!  image952×547 73.8 KB  Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contribution Author     298.1 Introducing DssGovRewards @hexonaut   218.5 On the priority of real world assets: Where do we stand? @spin   174.5 [On-chain Poll] Stablecoin Vaults Fee Adjustment - 7th Dec 2020 @Primoz   156.7 Technical Report: B.Protocol liquidations during last Thursday @yaronvel   132.6 [ONBOARDING POLL ] Add RWA-001 (6s Capital) as a Collateral Type @flipflopflapdelegate   118 [Signal Request] YFI Vault Options @Primoz   115.6 DSChief v1.2 Migration Steps @Derek   114.5  Discussion: WBTC-B collateral type, backed by B.Protocol with x10 leverage @yaronvel   111 [NS-DROP] Collateral Onboarding Risk Evaluation @Philinje   107.2 Clarity on Adding RWA-001 (6s Capital) as collateral type - Poll Vote @mrabino1    Top Contributors Below are the top 10 contributors last week, ranked by Cred generated.     Cred Contributor     267.2 hexonaut   246.2 Primoz   190.1 ElProgreso   172.1 SebVentures   170 LongForWisdom   136 cmooney   121.3 yaronvel   112.3 iammeeoh   102.8 mrabino1   85 Aaron-Bartsch    Top New Contributors Below is a chart of the top new Cred earners in the last six weeks (i.e. their first contribution was made during last six weeks).  image1842×1170 163 KB  If you have any questions or concerns about the scores, data or presentation thereof, please don’t hesitate to ask!
Great to see the progress of this incentive structure. Anecdotally speaking, it does feel like more people are getting actively involved.

Yeah, I hardly ever see opportunities to post anything myself. There are superb technical contributors, insightful theorists, cheerleaders, and the occasionally humorous posts. I’m generally intimidated into silence by the quality of discussion.

False humility will get you no Cred @psychonaut! You are a heavy hitter par excellence! Kidding aside, it is cool to see the uptick in participation, new contributors come in. Also always open to critiques or issues people see arising. Always room to improve.
Yeah, lots of lurking here too.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
